publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3031 Des McNulty on behalf of the Finance Committee: 2nd Report of the Finance Committee, Cross-cutting Expenditure Review of Economic Development—That the Parliament notes the recommendations contained in the Finance Committee’s 2nd Report, 2005 (Session 2): Cross-cutting Expenditure Review of Economic Development (SP Paper 312). Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
